Roger from R77 here - We've got a streamlined process for digitizing info so we can scale quickly beyond the 400K+ rooms in our database.  The image is generated from G! Earth using proprietary algorithms we've developed to create an accurate room view.  Tweet us or shoot us an e-mail if you have any suggestions!
Pitch is here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=2e_KCz-j0BA#t=310s
